## Account class

<b><i>this should never be shared or left in storage</i></b><br />

a class for representing the account mnemonic

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare class Account 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(mnemonic)](./opaque.account._constructor_.md) |  | creates an account from a mnemonic if provided, otherwise from entropy |
